title: High Functionality
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>It’s hot…. Even though I’m wearing a parasol….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s because the asphalt is reflecting some of it, so to a certain degree there’s nothing we can do. By the way, your lace parasol is really pretty, Maki-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Is that so….? Thanks. Yours is…. practical?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, the inside of mine has a special coating, not only does it cut down the amount of UV rays, it also provides more shading<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hee, that kind of thing exists?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Plus, it cuts down a lot of the heat from the sun, so it’s a little cooler than a normal parasol. Come here for a bit<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Does it really make that much of a d-.... It does. It’s much cooler!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Come on, it’s hot so you can go under mine<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>No, it’ll be hotter if we’re cramped together….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You don’t have to be so shy~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m not being shy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
